import React, { Component } from 'react' import Score from '../components/Score' import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table' class LeaderBoard extends Component { render() { const { user } = this.props const { id, name, avatarURL } = user const numberOfResponse = Object.keys(user.answers).length const numberOfQuestionAsk = user.questions.length return (
Users Question Ask Question Answer Total Score
Mark Otto @mdo
2 Jacob Thornton @fat
3 Larry the Bird @twitter
) } } function mapStateToProps ({users}, { id }) { const user = users[id] return { user, users, } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(LeaderBoard)
